site.title: Accessible Medical Records via Integrated Technologies

call_to_action.title: Contribute to AMRIT and Make a Difference
call_to_action.description: Join our community to help improve healthcare technology for millions. Whether you're contributing code, enhancing documentation, or providing community support, every contribution counts.

program_cta.title: Together, we can transform the future of health
program_cta.description: Join our mission to revolutionize healthcare technology and impact millions of lives. Whether you're a government partner driving policy change, a knowledge partner advancing research, a technical partner building innovative solutions, or a community contributor enhancing our platform, your role is vital.

partner_cta.title: Partner with Us to Drive Impact
partner_cta.description: Join us in our mission to transform communities through innovation and collaboration. We are actively seeking partnerships with forward-thinking technical experts, generous donors, and visionary knowledge leaders. Together, we can create sustainable change and bring our vision to life.

params.footer_description: AMRIT is an open-source platform designed to strengthen primary healthcare by empowering frontline health workers with the right digital tools for data-driven decision-making and seamless access to patients' Electronic Health Records (EHR) through ABDM-compliant, interoperable systems.
params.location: 3rd Floor, No. 6-3-1112 AWFIS Oyster Complex, Greenlands Road Somajiguda, Begumpet, Hyderabad – 500016, India.
